Once upon a time, in a lush green pond, there lived a little frog named Ferdinand. He watched the handsome princes ride by on their majestic horses and sighed, wishing for a life beyond the lily pads. One day, a kind-hearted fairy overheard his wish and granted him a day as a prince. Ferdinand transformed, donning a regal outfit and a crown. He reveled in the royal life, but soon realized the weight of responsibility. By sunset, he returned to his pond, grateful for his simple life. Ferdinand learned that true happiness comes from embracing who you are, not what you wish to be.
